short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Goodreads ratings for books in Amazon pages.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Goodreads ratings for Amazon is a small extension that shows Goodreads ratings in Amazon pages. It also provides with a link to directly visit the Goodreads page.

Works with most Amazon domains.

ABOUT PERMISSIONS
=================
This extension just asks for the minimal permissions needed. If you have any doubt about it just take a look at the source code at github.
https://github.com/rubenmv/extension-goodreads-ratings-for-amazon/

LEGAL STUFF
===========
Goodreads ratings for Amazon is licensed as Apache 2.0. 
For bugs report visit the github project page at 
https://github.com/rubenmv/extension-goodreads-ratings-for-amazon/issues
or send me an email to

VERSION
=======

2.0.5 - 2023.07.23
- Improved data extraction from Goodreads.

2.0.3 - 2023.07.08
- Fixes various problems.
- Adds options page.
- Adds option to always display Amazon's version of Goodreads ratings (as of now, only Amazon.com).
